original_text: The enrollment of the priests was according to their fathers' houses; that of the Levites from twenty years old and upward was according to their offices, by their divisions.
korean_text: 또 그들의 족속대로 족보에 기록된 제사장들에게 나눠 주며 이십세 이상에서 그 반열대로 직무를 맡은 레위 사람들에게 나눠 주며

sentences.original_text: The enrollment of the priests was according to their fathers' houses
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장의 등록은 그 아비 집안을 따랐다.

sentences.original_text: that of the Levites from twenty years old and upward
sentences.korean_translation: 스무 살 이상인 레위 사람의 등록은
